author: pdobacz
content:
> You missed the elephant in the room, that is Erigon
> 
> The only viable client in your comparison is Geth.  I think that is skewing findings TBH.
The choice of clients will be reviewed at stage 2, stage 1 results are known to have been only very preliminary.
For Erigon specifically, all depends on how much its EVM differs from Geth's at that point in time.
